name: Expression Encoder Job File
summary: File created by Microsoft Expression Encoder, an application used for transcoding video; saves a video encoding job in an XML format; stores references to the source video files as well as the transcoding settings for each file in the job; also saves the output video quality and file type (e.g., .WMV ); used as Encoder's native save file type.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
